alert.note: Alert for Adair; Adams; Cass (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 07 at 7:12PM CDT until June 07 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Cass County in southwestern Iowa... Northeastern Adams County in southwestern Iowa... Southern Adair County in southwestern Iowa... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 712 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles southeast of Atlantic, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Bridgewater around 725 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Fontanelle, Nodaway Park and Orient. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
